original_text:
They will devour your harvests and food,
    devour your sons and daughters;
they will devour your flocks and herds,
    devour your vines and fig trees.
With the sword they will destroy
    the fortified cities in which you trust.
korean_text: 그들이 네 자녀들이 먹을 추수 곡물과 양식을 먹으며 네 양 떼와 소 떼를 먹으며 네 포도나무와 무화과나무 열매를 먹으며 네가 믿는 견고한 성들을 칼로 파멸하리라

sentences.original_text: They will devour your harvests and food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 곡물과 음식을 탐할 것이다

sentences.original_text: they will devour your flocks and herds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 양 떼와 가축을 탐할 것이다

sentences.original_text: devour your vines and fig trees
With the sword they will destroy
the fortified cities in which you trust
